snippet.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Feature Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Divinity: Original Sin 2 on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/435150/Divinity_Original_Sin_2/
Join us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/larianstudios
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LarianStudios/

The eagerly anticipated sequel to the award-winning RPG. Gather your party. Master deep, tactical combat. Join up to 3 other players - but know that only one of you will have the chance to become a God.
